actions.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Dingell.
On agreeing to the Dingell amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 126 - 278 (Roll no. 578).

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to recognize the validity of electronic signatures and records in commercial transactions.
purpose: Amendment no. 2 printed in H. Rept. 106-462 to recognize the validity of electronic signatures and records in commercial transactions.
